original_body_lines: Int'l Nurses’ day celebrated... Sri Lankan Nurses joined their global counterparts to celebrate the International Nurses' day in Colombo today. Chief of Staff to the President and National Security Advisor Sagala Ratnayaka, Justice Minister Wijedasa Rajapakshe, Labour and Foreign Employment Minister Manusha Nanayakkara and Director General of Trade Unions to the President Saman Ratnapriya are seen sharing lighter moments during the event.  Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
